Detailed Description

This is an interface which must be derived from in order to receive time queue events.

virtual void TimerHandler::handleTimeout ( TimerHandle  handle,
void *  pUser 
) [pure virtual]

This method is called when a timeout expires.

Parameters:
handle The handle returned when the event was added.
pUser The user data passed in when the event was added.
